events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product in their shipment.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for handling the refund request related to the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! I’m Sarah, I’ll be assisting you with your refund request. Sorry for the inconvenience caused by the wrong item shipment.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can process your refund quickly?
I attached the photos of the item I got along with the receipt and my order number is 458221. Let me know if you need anything else.
Thank you for the details! We will initiate the refund process immediately and you will get the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for acting fast on this! I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please check your payment method in the next few days for the returned amount.
Just following up to confirm that the refund was received and if there’s anything more we can assist you with today.
Since your refund was received and there are no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
